claim.text: The volatility forecasting task refers to predicting the amount of variability in the price of a financial asset over a certain period. claim.text: The paper proposes a novel hierarchical, transformer, multi-task architecture designed to harness the text and audio data from quarterly earnings conference calls to predict future price volatility in the short and long term.
